    Version{"2.1.49.82"}
    characterLabelPattern{
        all{"{0} — all"}
        category-list{"{0}: {1}"}
        compatibility{"{0} — compatibility"}
        enclosed{"{0} — enclosed"}
        extended{"{0} — extended"}
        historic{"{0} — historic"}
        miscellaneous{"{0} — miscellaneous"}
        other{"{0} — other"}
        scripts{"scripts — {0}"}
        strokes{
            other{"{0} strokes"}
        }
    }
    codePatterns{
        language{"{0}"}
        script{"{0}"}
        territory{"{0}"}
    }
    localeDisplayPattern{
        keyTypePattern{"{0}: {1}"}
        pattern{"{0} ({1})"}
        separator{"{0}, {1}"}
    }
}
